view

类 MenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.MenuController

  • public class MenuController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handle event when user interact with the menu, pass it to View

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MenuController() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void displaySelectedFileName(java.lang.String filename, boolean validFile, java.lang.String mapInfo)
      Display selected file name and invalid message if necessary Called by View.update()
      void initialize(View view)
      Get View reference, add event listener
      void quit()
      Called when user confirm the quit process by clicking yes button Pass the event to View
      void resetStartUpMenu()
      Reset start up menu, reset previous loading file info Called by switchToStartGameMenu()
      void selectMap()
      Select map for starting the new game Called when user clicked the select map button Pass event to View
      void showNumPlayerTextField(int maxPlayerNum)
      Set then show the number of player text field Called by View.update()
      void showStartGameButton()
      Show start game button, game is fully loaded and ready to start Called by View.update()
      void startGame()
      Called when user click the start game button Pass event to the View
      void switchToMapEditor()
      Switch to Map Editor Called when user click the map editor button
      void switchToNewGameMenu()
      Switch to new game menu, hide irrelevant panes Called when user click the new game button
      void switchToQuitMenu()
      Switch to quit menu Called when user click quit button on menu
      void switchToStartGameMenu()
      Switch to start game menu Called when user quit to the menu page

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize(View view)
        Get View reference, add event listener
        参数:
        view - the View reverence

      • switchToMapEditor

        public void switchToMapEditor()
        Switch to Map Editor Called when user click the map editor button

      • switchToStartGameMenu

        public void switchToStartGameMenu()
        Switch to start game menu Called when user quit to the menu page

      • switchToNewGameMenu

        public void switchToNewGameMenu()
        Switch to new game menu, hide irrelevant panes Called when user click the new game button

      • switchToQuitMenu

        public void switchToQuitMenu()
        Switch to quit menu Called when user click quit button on menu

      • resetStartUpMenu

        public void resetStartUpMenu()
        Reset start up menu, reset previous loading file info Called by switchToStartGameMenu()

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Called when user confirm the quit process by clicking yes button Pass the event to View

      • selectMap

        public void selectMap()
        Select map for starting the new game Called when user clicked the select map button Pass event to View

      • displaySelectedFileName

        public void displaySelectedFileName(java.lang.String filename,
                                    boolean validFile,
                                    java.lang.String mapInfo)
        Display selected file name and invalid message if necessary Called by View.update()
        参数:
        filename - is the selected file name
        validFile - decides whether the selected file is valid
        mapInfo - gives additional info if the selected is invalid

      • showNumPlayerTextField

        public void showNumPlayerTextField(int maxPlayerNum)
        Set then show the number of player text field Called by View.update()
        参数:
        maxPlayerNum - is the max number of player allowed for the selected file

      • showStartGameButton

        public void showStartGameButton()
        Show start game button, game is fully loaded and ready to start Called by View.update()

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Called when user click the start game button Pass event to the View
